Consider the path of least resistance.  My guess is url to wsdl sent via em=
ail or some wiki with a link in it.

On Jun 10, 2010, at 3:39 AM, Sean Kenn=
edy wrote:

> 
> 
> Hi,
>     I work in academia so would be grateful for t=
he industry perspective. I am working on a thesis which includes both WS-* =
and REST. If UDDI is in fact dead http://www.innoq.com/blog/st/2010/03/uddi=
_rip.html how are enterprises communicating the WSDL files? Are we talking =
email, publishing on a Web site, inserting into a db??
> 
> Thanks,
> Sean.=

> 
> PS Would the same apply for WADL files?
> 
> 
> 
> 


--Apple-Mail-8--600897110
